name: Ipanema Twitter Feed
author: segcgonz

sections.description: This plugin lets you add various twitter feeds into your WordPress site. Using a shortcode, administrators will be able to add twitter feeds in any page or post.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin
  2. Upload the ipanema-twitter-feed folder to your site’s wp-content/plugins directory
  3. Activate the plugin in the WordPress Admin Panel
  4. Set the different Twitter feed configurations
  5. Use the [twitterfeed option_id=”1″] shortcode to feed the tweets in a page or post of your WordPress site.
  6. Change the “option id” (between 1 to 5) to render a specific feed.
  7. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
How can I add the twitter feed in a page or post?

You just need to add your preferred configuration’s shortcode at in any page or post. Change the ‘option_id’ parameter in the shortcode to render a specific ‘Twitter feed configuration’.
For example, if you want to show the feed related to configuration one, you just have to add:

[twitterfeed option_id=”1″]

short_description: Add different kind of twitter feeds in your WordPress site!
description: This plugin lets you add various twitter feeds into your WordPress site. Using a shortcode, administrators will be able to add twitter feeds in any page or post.
